game.name: Train Simulator: S-Bahn S1 München
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Munich S1 crosses the city back and forth, East to West and North to South over a total of around 60km of track. As driver, you take control of DB’s venerable BR423, moving passengers on journeys across Munich lasting up to an hour.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Munich S1 crosses the city back and forth, East to West and North to South over a total of around 60km of track. As driver, you take control of DB’s venerable BR423, moving passengers on journeys across Munich lasting up to an hour.
